title: Print, "Plate in Nouvelles Cheminée faittes en plusieur en droits (New Designs for Fireplaces)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower right: inventé et gravée / D. Marot
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower left: auec Preuillege des Etats generaux des Province Vnie
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: The fireplace is decorated with an escutcheon flanked by two figures. A roundel framed by garlands and a mask over the mantelpiece. Above, a vase filled with flowers between two sphinxes, and a crowned roundel with cornucopia. Left, a panel depicting a landscape with trees and figures. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plate in Nouvelles Cheminée faittes en plusieur en droits (New Designs for Fireplaces)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-50.
